name: Alarielle's Kiss
description: Held in a delicate jade bottle, this luminescent potion heals the drinker's wounds instantly.
effect: You can drink this potion before making your action roll. Roll a dice for each wound marker on your card; on a 2 or 3, replace it with a stun maker. On a 4, 5 or 6 remove it entirely. Then discard this card.
